Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Requires independent hearing officers for certain disciplinary hearings
Summary: Requires independent hearing officers for disciplinary hearings involving paid officers or members of organized fire companies or fire departments in certain municipalities.
LawCode: Amd ยง75, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to independent hearing officers for certain disciplinary hearings
